alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prentiss and south central Alcorn Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jumpertown, or near Booneville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Jumpertown, Thrashers, Hinkle, Rienzi and Gaston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
